event.title: Presentation of AlekSIS at the FSFE local group meeting in Berlin, Germany

body.p: The local group of FSFE in Berlin meets for its regular meeting on every second Thursday of the month. All those interested in Free Software are welcome. The meeting takes place from 7pm at the E-LOK youth club at Laskerstraße 4-6, not far from Ostkrez station. Access to E-LOK is barrier-free and via the right entrance to the courtyard. Bring a good mood.
This time we are happy to welcome a guest. Hangzhi from AlekSIS® will present the Free School Information and Organisation System. The presentation will be in German language.
